description: Safe learning of regions of attraction in uncertain, nonlinear systems with Gaussian processes
README.md:
# Safe learning of regions of attraction (ROA) This code accompanies the paper:
"F. Berkenkamp, R. Moriconi, A. P. Schoellig, A. Krause, "Safe Learning of Regions of Attraction in Uncertain, Nonlinear Systems with Gaussian Processes", arXiv, arXiv:1603.04915 [cs.SY]. Next to the source code, the results are documented in the following HTML jupyter notebooks: * 1d_example.ipynb * inverted_pendulum.ipynb
